      • determineType

        public static String determineType(String[] vector,
                   Boolean doPreferDouble)
        Given a String[] vector of data values along one column, try to infer what the data type should be. TODO: precompile regex
        Parameters:
        vector -
        Returns:
        string representing name of the type "integer", "double", "character", or "logical" The algorithm will first scan the vector to detect whether the vector contains only digits, ',' and '.',
        if true, then it will detect whether the vector contains '.',
            if true then the vector is double else it is integer
        if false, then it will detect whether the vector contains only 'T' and 'F'
            if true then the vector is logical, otherwise it is characters
